name: Sentences Of Frontier
description:
Game developed by Expresso Bits for Game JaaJ of André Young, from July 12, 2019 until July 21, 2019 (9 days). 

Theme: Not everything is what it seems. Sentence of Frontier will keep you in small scenarios, where you must survive and learn to warm up to face the cold. To do this, you will have as main objective, keep yourself warm, while trying to understand what is happening. 

The Sentence of Frontier Design consists of demonstrating cool, dense scenarios with closed and narrow environments, thus showing the player how impotent he is within Sentence of Frontier. While the graphic covers in textures in Pixel Art (16x16 / 32x32 / 64x64), with light shaders and visual adaptation.
